chapter.title: Image Handling

chapter.para: Depending on the output format you generate with &dapsacr; (PDF or HTML for example), the source images you provide and reference in your XML sources are automatically transformed into the appropriate output formats. For example, SVG images are converted to PNG for HTML builds, or color images to grayscale for black-and-white PDFs. For basic information about image handling (such as supported formats, where to store the images in your documentation directory, and how to reference them in your XML files), refer to .
